changes.value: { "type": "note", "filter": [{ "k": "type", "v": "ability-check" }, { "k": "ability", "v": "charisma" }], "note": { "rollMode": 1, "text": "You have advantage on Charisma checks made to interact with or influence creatures with the Animal tag." } }

description.value: All Beasts and creatures with the Animal tag understand your speech, and you can understand their noises and motions as if they were speaking, even if they don't speak a language. This ability doesnâ€™t grant Beasts the intelligence to understand or communicate complex concepts, but you can share basic information with ease. Your GM has final say on what a particular creature can express. In addition, you have advantage on Charisma checks made to interact with or influence such creatures.
